bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: UI: incorrect rendering possible with Spark training + J7FileStatsStorage
bug.description: Seems to be concatenating data for all workers, instead of just rendering the data for a single worker... Even so, iteration counts seem to be off also. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2360237/35801789-c1db791a-0ac1-11e8-99da-6f14bca3a904.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
